    • Uses of Item in game

      Subclasses of Item in game 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Bomb
      A bomb which is a type of Item and hurt Actors when it explodes.
      class  Corpse
      A corpse item which is portable and created when an actor is dead.
      class  Food
      A food item which is portable and can be eaten.
      class  Plank
      A primitive weapon.
      class  PortableItem
      Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
      class  RangedWeapon
      An ranged weapon which is a type of weapon item which uses ammunition.
      class  Shotgun
      A shotgun which is a type of ranged weapon that has a short range.
      class  SimpleClub
      A type of Weapon Item that only appears when a Zombie dropped its limb
      class  SniperRifle
      A sniple rifle which is a type of ranged weapon that rewards patience.
      class  Vehicle
      An item which represents a vehicle that moves actor to other map.
      class  ZombieClub
      A weapon item that is crafted by an actor from a zombie arm
      class  ZombieMace
      A weapon item that is crafted by an actor from a zombie leg
      Constructors in game with parameters of type Item 
      Constructor Description
      RangedWeapon​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int damage, Item ammunition)
      Create a RangedWeapon object which is not portable using a String that specifies its name, a char that specifies its display character, an integer that specifies the amount of damage this ranged weapon does as a melee weapon and an item which represents the ammunition to be loaded into this ranged weapon.
      Shotgun​(Item ammunition)
      Create a Shotgun object using a String that specifies its name, a char that specifies its display character, an integer that specifies the amount of damage this shotgun does and an item which represents the ammunition to be loaded into this shotgun.
      SniperRifle​(Item ammunition)
      Create a SnipleRifle object using a String that specifies its name, a char that specifies its display character, an integer that specifies the amount of damage this sniple rifle does and an item which represents the ammunition to be loaded into this sniple rifle.
